casebody.data:
HAYMOND
v.
HOOKS, et al. 200P10-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 20, 2018 Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of NC. Gene W. Haymond, for Haymond, Gene Wayne.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of October 2018 by Petitioner for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of November 2018."
